==================================                                              
It is the Year 2034. Beneath the ruins of post-apocalyptic Moscow, in the  tunnels of  the Metro, the remnants  of  mankind  are  besieged  by deadly threats from outside ÃƒÂ» and  within.  Mutants stalk the catacombs beneath the  desolate surface, and hunt  amidst  the  poisoned  skies  above.  But rather than stand united, the station-cities of the Metro are locked in a  struggle  for  the  ultimate power, a doomsday device from the  military  vaults of D6. A civil war  is  stirring  that  could  wipe humanity from the face of  the  earth  forever.  As Artyom, burdened by guilt but driven by  hope,  you hold the key to our survival ÃƒÂ» the  last  light  in our darkest hour...
